abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: Country: Brazil TaxonKey: Diplusodon Pohl The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbarium Berolinense 1 records from MAR - Herbário do Maranhão 1 records from Moscow University Herbarium (MW) 1 records from MBML-Herbario - Herbário Mello Leitão 1 records from BOTU - Herbário Irina Delanova Gemtchújnicov 1 records from HTSA - Herbário do Trópico Semiárido 1 records from HVASF - Herbário Vale do São Francisco 1 records from SLUI - Herbário Rosa Mochel 1 records from SORO - Herbário do Centro de Ciências e Tecnologias para a Sustentabilidade 1 records from HRCB - Herbário Rioclarense 1 records from JOI - Herbário Joinvillea 1 records from DVPR -
